Text:
im suprised they made a new series as
the last one was dragging out with more and more
BS

you might like ufo and ancient bits in the docu
called THRIVE if not seen it.. found that way more
interesting watch myself
Cheers for the share, good show.

I'm glad it's back. 

I agree with psspss to a certain degree. Some of the leaps they take to the ancient alien theory are pretty big stretches of the imagination, 

but the thing I love about this show is the mysterious places around the world that we never get to hear about. There's some VERY interesting questions from the past, that modern science hasn't been able to explain. 

To me, that is what the show is all about. 

Dudes, fake tan and crazy hair-do is always good for a laugh too.  :D

Love to see this before I go to bed... it helps me sleep ;)

Can anyone provide English subtitles?

I wish documentaries would allways have subtitles like movies.
Thanks, great show regardless of what you believe!
Want a good drinking game? Watch any episode of Ancient Aliens... Every time the narrator says "IF SO" drink a shot. Be sure you have enough booze.
